title: So if you're breaking meta, what makes you deny someone just for breaking meta?
body: Just curious cause this happens alot and I'm wondering where people are coming from.

replies.body: I'm guessing Solwolf or Siv HD. Personally, I don't care about the meta, I just want to have fun and if there's a chance you can gain an advantage to win, why not do it? Case in point, a while back we did ADC with Support top, other team didn't expect it but still we won and it wasn't as if he ways always having a hard time, he got a couple of good ganks. Whenever I play, I tend to play dirty, I don't exactly line up and fire when ordered. No, I'm not toxic and swear at people, more like "hello there I see you're having trouble how about a nice gank from the entire team!?"
I was wondering the same thing
cause people on this game are assholes who spend their days playing ranked 24/7
